simlib.framework.Trajectory¶

class simlib.framework.Trajectory(xyz, box=None, topology=None)[source]¶

Trajectory stores instantaneous data for a Topology, i.e., atomic coordinates, box information, velocity, etc.

property n_atoms¶

Number of atoms in the Trajectory.

Returns

Number of atoms

Return type

int

property n_dim¶

Number of dimensions.

Returns

Number of dimensions

Return type

int

property n_structures¶

Number of structures in the Trajectory.

Returns

Number of structures

Return type

int

  • only_index –

Shape of Trajectory

Returns

(Number of structures, number of atoms, dimensionality)

Convert Trajectory to PDB.
